simpleRmaExample.cpp File Reference

A simple example of RMA as implemented in the ChipStream framework to give a flavor of how things work. To keep example simple and readable very little error checking is done as we progress. Please do not use this example for real life data analysis. More...

 Everybody's favorite function.

Detailed Description

A simple example of RMA as implemented in the ChipStream framework to give a flavor of how things work. To keep example simple and readable very little error checking is done as we progress. Please do not use this example for real life data analysis.

Author:
Chuck Sugnet
Date:
Thu Jan 12 11:06:30 2006

Definition in file simpleRmaExample.cpp.

Function Documentation

void doRma ( const string  cdfFile,
const string  outDir,
vector< string > &  celFiles 
)

Perform Robust Multichip Average (RMA) analysis on the cel files specified.

This simple example doesn't do very much in the way of error checking and shouldn't be included as error checking.

Parameters:
cdfFile - Layout of probesets on chip.
outDir - Directory to write results to.
numCelFiles - How many cel files are in the array.
celFiles - Array of cel file names to be used.
